alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Ozark (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 10:51AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ozark and southeastern Douglas Counties through 1115 AM CST... At 1051 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Ava to 7 miles northwest of Gainesville to near Price Place. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bryant Creek State Park, Bull Shoals Lake, Norfork Lake, Gainesville, Bakersfield, Pontiac, Wasola, Brixey, Noble, Willhoit, Tecumseh, Udall, Gentryville, Hardenville, Sycamore, Squires, Dora, Rockbridge and Zanoni. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
